name: Mindbug
description: Simple GTD app for everyone made with Electron and React.

scripts.compile: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] src/app.jsx -o js/app.js
scripts.start: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] src/app.jsx -o js/app.js && electron main.js
